description: Halle Lidner is a former Secret Service agent who works for Near as part of the SPK, and is the only female member of this organisation. She joined the SPK to avenge one of her relatives who has been killed by Higuchi at the time when he acted as Kira. She states being on neither Near`s or Mello`s side in the competition to catch Kira, and even leaks information to Mello about the investigation, as her only purpose left is to catch Kira.
name: Halle Lidner
